vlive.korean: 이렇게 하는 게 들리는 게 좀 신기하네~ It's fascinating that you can hear what I am saying. 듣기 View video SF9 : 어머님들
vlive.english: It's fascinating that you can hear what I am saying.

vlive.korean: 신기하죠 여러분도? It's fascinating for you too, right? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 차은우의 Just One 10 Minutes
vlive.english: It's fascinating for you too, right?

vlive.korean: 근데 되게 신기했어요 너무... It was very fascinating at first... 듣기 View video VICTON : 오랜만입니다..🖤-@
vlive.english: It was very fascinating at first...

vlive.korean: 여러분 이거 눈화장 신기하죠? Don't you find this eye makeup fascinating? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : STAY! 우리두 해피 뉴 이어!!!!!!!
vlive.english: Don't you find this eye makeup fascinating?

vlive.korean: 신기해! 과일 진짜 많아 아니야? So fascinating!! There are so many fruits, no?? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : IZ*ONE 에너지 캠 플러스(ENOZI Cam +) 아이즈원, 태국 마트에 가다!
vlive.english: So fascinating!! There are so many fruits, no??

examples.korean: a fascinating story / subject 듣기 Add to Wordbook 대단히 흥미로운 이야기/매력적인 주제 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a fascinating story / subject Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The local history of the area is fascinating. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 지역의 지역사는 아주 흥미롭다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The local history of the area is fascinating. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The town offers a fascinating mix of old and new. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 소도시는 신구의 멋진 혼합을 보여 준다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The town offers a fascinating mix of old and new. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The results of the survey made fascinating reading. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 조사 결과는 아주 흥미로운 읽을거리였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The results of the survey made fascinating reading. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I fail to see what women find so fascinating about him. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 여자들이 그를 왜 그렇게 매력적이라고 생각하는지 알 수가 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I fail to see what women find so fascinating about him. Add to Wordbook
